AVIA.TA.summary: Aviation Links Ltd. operates flights worldwide. The company also offers landing and visa arrangement, tour organization, and visiting services; tours and vacation packages; and car rental, cruise packages, hotel room booking, family park facilities, accommodation in luxury villas and estates, train tickets and seats booking, tickets for shows and sports events, organized trips, and other services, as well as hotel, resort, and club services. It serves travel agents in Israel, employee committees of large enterprises, industrial and technology companies, professional associations, and local councils. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

ISTA.TA.summary: Issta Lines Ltd. provides travel and tourism services to private and business customers, groups, and organizations in Israel and internationally. It offers outbound and domestic tourism services, including regular and international flights, charter flights, vacation packages, organized tours, ski vacations, sports, music, and cruises, as well as complementary services, such as hotels, car rentals, visas, and student cards. The company offers its products through 39 branches in Israel, as well as through call centers and online. Issta Lines Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
